key.name: window-size
key.summary: The current size of the main window.

key.name: history
key.summary: A short history of the places the user has visited.

key.name: track-color
key.summary: Use this color for the GPS traces on the map.

key.name: map-source-id
key.summary: The id of the map to display to the user.

key.name: latitude
key.summary: Current latitude that the map is centered on.

key.name: longitude
key.summary: Current longitude that the map is centered on.

key.name: zoom-level
key.summary: Current level to which the map is zoomed.

key.name: left-pane-page
key.summary: Indicates whether the Photos, Cameras, or GPS tab is currently visible.

key.name: animation-steps
key.summary: How many steps the initial fade-in animation should play at app launch.
key.description: Set this number lower in order to speed app launch.

key.name: thumbnail-size
key.summary: Width in pixels for the thumbnails in the photo pane.

key.name: use-dark-theme
key.summary: Use the dark GTK theme, if available.

key.name: show-map-scale
key.summary: Determines whether or not to show the scale on the map.

key.name: show-map-center
key.summary: Determines whether or not to show the crosshair at map center.

key.name: show-map-coords
key.summary: Determines whether or not to show the latitude and longitude atop the map.

key.name: offset
key.summary: The error in the camera's clock, measured in seconds.

key.name: timezone-method
key.summary: What method is used to determine the camera's timezone.
key.description: This rubbish is necessary because the EXIF standard does not specify the timezone, even if the user has specified a timezone in their camera's setup menu.

key.name: found-timezone
key.summary: The timezone that the camera was last known to be used in.
key.description: This key is only consulted if timezone-method is 'lookup'.

key.name: timezone-region
key.summary: The custom timezone region that the user has selected, if any.
key.description: This key is only consulted if timezone-method is 'custom'. The value is an int representing the index of the continent selected manually by the user.

key.name: timezone-city
key.summary: The custom timezone city that the user has selected, if any.
key.description: This key is only consulted if timezone-method is 'custom'. The value is an int representing the index of the city selected manually by the user.

key.name: utc-offset
key.summary: How many hours you are away from UTC.

key.name: track-color
key.summary: Use this color for the polygons on the map.

key.name: start-timezone
key.summary: The timezone that the GPS trace began at.
